scripts.deploy:dev: echo 'WARNING: ENSURE you are running make deploy and not just npm run deploy:dev' && NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4000 sls deploy -s dev --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:qa: echo 'WARNING: ENSURE you are running make deploy and not just npm run deploy:qa' && NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4000 sls deploy -s qa --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:prod: echo 'WARNING: ENSURE you are running make deploy and not just npm run deploy:prod' && NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4000 sls deploy -s prod --region us-east-1
